jobDescription: This client, located in downtown Chicago, is looking for an exceptional Data Scientist who prides themselves on incorporating the latest and greatest techniques in visualization for an emerging healthcare organization. They offer a hip start-up atmosphere but the stability and growth of a well-established organization.  The Data Scientist will work with teams in various departments and translate their requirements into scalable, accessible, and relevant visualization reports to provide instant actionable analysis.  This candidate MUST HAVE at least 4 years of experience with data visualization and dashboarding, preferably with PowerBI (although Tableau is acceptable). Ideally, this Data Scientist will have strong data modeling and want to pick up the latest Azure/Cloud technologies, as well as Machine Learning. Proficient with Python and R? Even better!  Perks include unlimited PTO, pre-tax commuter benefits, standing desks, healthy breakfast, and a Divvy bike membership. *THIS IS A DIRECT-HIRE OPPORTUNITY AND CANDIDATES MUST BE ABLE TO WORK DIRECTLY ON W2 AS GREEN CARD OR US CITIZEN. SPONSORSHIP IS NOT OFFERED*provided by Dice Data Scientist
